attributes.action: Support the mayor's plan to urgently relocate Heathrow airport
attributes.additional_details:
Flights continuously  landing (from 4.30am) and departing at Heathrow cause misery to millions of residents on the flight paths.
Urgently build a new, large airport in the Thames Estuary served by rapid rail links. Flights would track in from the sea and disturb very few.
This would be a much better use of tax payers funds than the HS2 vanity and provide much needed employment.
